Plot: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing moralistic parents.
Title: The Birdcage
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 25 nominations.
Actors: Robin Williams, Gene Hackman, Nathan Lane, Dianne Wiest
Writer: Jean Poiret (play), Francis Veber (earlier screenplay), Édouard Molinaro (earlier screenplay), Marcello Danon (earlier screenplay), Jean Poiret (earlier screenplay), Elaine May (screenplay)
